name: EUROSENSE
membership: EARSC (European Association of Remote Sensing Companies)
goal:
EUROSENSE is a prominent player on the market of geo-information services. EUROSENSE offers high quality geo-information to public and private partners since 1964. This information and these services are provided based on airborne and spaceborne data.
The EUROSENSE Group has 9 subsidiaries spread over Europe. EUROSENSE employs about 130 highly specialized people (geographers, agronomists, engineers,…).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Digital economy and society, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Space Policy
Water Framework Directive
Flood Directive
Deforestation monitoring
Horizon 2020
